Sentencas: The search for alternative anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) has been reviewed in the light of structure, stability, conductivity, chemical and thermal compatibility with electrolyte YSZ.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this review, we have presented the advantages and disadvantages of the traditional Ni-YSZ anode for SOFCs.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The development of alternative anode for SOFCs with fluorite, rutile, tungsten bronze, pyrochlore, perovskite and spinel structures has been reviewed and discussed in detail.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among the reported materials systems, materials with perovskite structure are promising particularly where two ions with complimentary function are present on the B-site at high concentration.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We have recently found a good redox stable anode (La0.75Sr0.25)(1-x)Cr0.5Mn0.5O3 (0 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 0.1) using this approach.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These materials exhibit comparable performance to the traditional Ni-YSZ anode.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Therefore, we can use nickel-free redox stable anode for SOFCs.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With further optimisation of the composition and microstructure, the performance of these materials may be further improved and hopefully replace the traditional Ni-YSZ anode in the future.
Titulo: Discovery and characterization of novel oxide anodes for solid oxide fuel cells
